sentences.en: Best practice is to spam sunder , and use HS in between to soak up excess rage.
sentences.cn: 实际效果最好是破甲和hs一起使用来消耗掉过量的怒气.

sentences.en: Devastate damage - per - sunder increased to 35.
sentences.cn: 破坏每破甲数量增加的伤害增加到35.

sentences.en: Does Devastate always generate more threat per rage point spent than Sunder Armor?
sentences.cn: 那么对比破甲而言,毁灭打击是否比其拥有更高的每点怒气产生威胁值?

sentences.en: Does Devastate generate more threat per hit than Sunder Armor?
sentences.cn: 毁灭打击比破甲产生更多的威胁值 吗 ?

sentences.en: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and brake their in sunder.
sentences.cn: 14他从黑暗中和死荫里领他们出来, 折断他们的绑索.

sentences.en: I don't want to sunder us.
In what ways is Devastate better than Sunder Armor?
sentences.cn: 毁灭打击到底在哪些方面比破甲好?

sentences.en: Is there any reason at all to use Sunder Armor when you have Devastate?
sentences.cn: 那么当我点出毁灭打击后,我还有必要使用破甲 吗 ?

sentences.en: Lightning tore the tree in sunder.
Police moved in to separate the two groups, already sundered by distrust.
sentences.cn: 警方介入将已分裂又互不信任的两组人隔离开。

sentences.en: See Sunder Armor in the warrior update below for additional details.
sentences.cn: 更多细节见以下对于战士破甲技能的修改.

sentences.en: Stan: You cannot go to the bathroom, you are stacking sunder armor!
sentences.cn: 屎蛋: 你现在不能去厕所, 你正在堆叠装甲!

sentences.en: The city is being sundered by racial tension.
sentences.cn: 该城市因民族关系紧张而正在分裂。

sentences.en: There has been a lot of rain and the road I sunder water.
sentences.cn: 雨水不断,道路都被淹没了.

sentences.en: There is a snake; cut it in sunder.
sentences.cn: 那边有条蛇, 把它砍断.

sentences.en: Time and distance often sunder friends.
sentences.cn: 朋友久别远离常产生隔阂.

sentences.en: Will you sunder nitrogen from air?
sentences.cn: 你能从空气中把氮气分离出来 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: to break something into parts, especially violently
